item.title: ZE551ML: flash firmware
item.description:
Asus ZenFone 2

  1. Unlock boot loader.
    Unlock Device App you can find at https://www.asus.com here in Utilities:
    Direct link.
  2. Download lastest firmware… you can find it at https://www.asus.com here in Firmware (select “for WW SKU only*”)
    Also, direct link can be curled:
URL='https://www.asus.com/us/support/Download/39/1/0/13/Lk0Sg1Ulh0Ph49Hl/32/' 
curl -s $URL| grep -o "\"http://dlcdnet.asus.com/pub/ASUS/ZenFone/ZE551ML/UL-Z00A-WW.*.zip\"" 
"http://dlcdnet.asus.com/pub/ASUS/ZenFone/ZE551ML/UL-Z00A-WW-2.20.40.174-user.zip"

  1. TWRP
    u can found here https://dl.twrp.me/Z00A/ (twrp-3.0.0-0-Z00A.img 15.3M )

  2. adb sideload
